text: (upbeat music)

- I'm Levi, I'm a software
development manager
on the AWS CloudTrail Team.
CloudTrail is a foundational AWS service

and we're responsible for
capturing all user activities

and events, kind of like
the black box of AWS
and what's happening in your account.

I've been with Amazon and
AWS for two months overall.
So I was a software engineer

turned software development
manager and built
on the AWS cloud for over a decade,
so excited to now get to build the cloud.
So it's been surprising how much ownership

and responsibility that
individuals and teams
have to drive product, shape features.
The scale at AWS is pretty unique.
You're dealing with volumes and numbers

that I don't think you
would see elsewhere.

So the massive scale
and scope that you have

for your products and
impact is pretty exciting.
If you wanna make a big impact and drive
exciting new features, then there's a lot
of those opportunities at AWS.
It's a fast-paced environment.

And so we're always developing,
always building something.
Come build with us.
(upbeat music)
